name: Crew Messaging
description: SMS-based messaging for crew assignments, changes, and rain delays with delivery confirmation.

prd.problemStatement: Crew members need timely notifications about assignments, schedule changes, and weather delays. SMS ensures messages reach crew even when they're on the course.
userStories: As a superintendent, I want to message crew via SMS so that they receive updates immediately
As a crew member, I want assignment notifications so that I know where to work
